images.title: Homepage
images.caption: Image caption here into two lines

images.title: Integration with Instagram og Twitter APIs
images.caption: The site features a live hashtag wall with images, videos, and statuses. They are pulled from the APIs of Instagram and Twitter, and cached for a period of time. The user are able to load older updates.

images.title: Application forms made easy
images.caption: The site has two application forms, made with Gravity Forms, to make it easy for the users to apply â€“ either as a volunteer or a band. The forms are mapped together with custom post types in the backend to make it easy for the client to control all the applications.

images.title: Planning & Sketches
images.caption: The sketching and wireframing process was a crucial step. I wanted to make sure no primary features/functionality were to be left out in the tablet and mobile versions.

projects.name: Jayj.dk
projects.description: My own website I've had since 2008.

projects.name: Jayj HTML5 theme
projects.description: A free HTML5 and CSS3 theme/template I created in 2009. It has had several major updates since then. It comes packaged with an Ajax powered PHP contact form and uses the CSS preprocessor LESS. It has been downloaded over 57.000 times.

projects.name: Cakifo
projects.description: A free WordPress blog theme I created in 2011. It uses the Hybrid Core theme framework, uses HTML5 and it's responsive. It has been downloaded over 58.000 times.
